name: Sand x Castle Challenge
description:
Here is my mini game for the TechnicallyAChallenge with the theme Sand x Castle. I wanted to go for some simple castle generation.

Controls:

  • Left Click: Adding a block
  • Right Click: Removing a block
  • WASD or Arrow: Moving the camera
  • Mouse Wheel: Zooming or Unzooming

Attributes:

  •   Seagull Sounds
  • Ambience Seaside
  • MiMU Studio for UI Parts
  • Flat-Icons for Icons
  • Smash Icons for Icons
  • FreePik for Icons
  • Chanut Is Industries for Icons
  • Nanum Pen Script (Google Font)
  • Jean-Baptiste Leonelli for the music
